fullText: Jessica Lange gives a performance of uncommon power and specificity as Mary Tyrone, the morphine-addicted mother whose self-deception is the play's tragic center.
dtliExcerpt: Jessica Lange gives a performance of uncommon power and specificity as Mary Tyrone, the morphine-addicted mother whose self-deception is the play's tragic center.
